title: What does HTML stand for?

What does JavaScript primarily do?
choices: Design the layout of a webpage

title: How do you write a single-line comment in JavaScript?
Which keyword is used to declare a variable in JavaScript?
What does CSS stand for?
Which property is used to change the color of text?
How do you select all elements with the class name "myClass"?
Which property is used to control the spacing between lines of text?
Which property is used to set the width of the border of an element?
How do you make an element float to the left side of its container?
Which property is used to add a background color to an element?
What is the purpose of the @import rule in CSS?
Which property is used to control the margin around an element?
What is the difference between inline and external CSS?
choices: Inline CSS is defined within the HTML element, external CSS is defined in a separate file.
Inline CSS is defined in a separate file, external CSS is defined within the HTML element.
There is no difference between inline and external CSS.
Inline CSS is used for styling, external CSS is used for layout.
answer: Inline CSS is defined within the HTML element, external CSS is defined in a separate file.

title: What is the correct way to write a JavaScript array?

choices: To execute a block of code conditionally
answer: To execute a block of code conditionally

title: How do you access the first element of an array named "myArray"?
Which method is used to add a new element to the end of an array?
What is the purpose of the document.getElementById() method?
choices: To get an element by its ID
To get an element by its class name
To create a new HTML element
To change the style of an element
answer: To get an element by its ID

title: What does the this keyword refer to within a function?
choices: The object that the function is a property of
The value returned by the function
answer: The object that the function is a property of

title: How do you create a hyperlink in HTML?
choices: Using the <a> tag with the href attribute
Using the tag with a URL
answer: Using the <a> tag with the href attribute

What is the purpose of the <head> section in an HTML document?
choices: To contain the main content of the page
To define metadata about the page
answer: To define metadata about the page

title: Which attribute is used to specify the URL of an image in the tag?
What is the difference between <div> and <span> tags?
choices: <div> is a block-level element, <span> is an inline element
<div> is an inline element, <span> is a block-level element
answer: <div> is a block-level element, <span> is an inline element
